ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Zardus growls, rolling out of some shots ways, getting hit by others. He stands up and curses, firing off a missile at Shocker, Surrender? I think not.

::Zardus/DeathStorm/DevilDuer::

Zardus growls, rolling out of some shots' ways, getting hit by others. He 
stands up and curses, firing off a missile at Shocker,

"Surrender? I think not." Zardus laughs, opening a channel to all alliance 
members on his comm-link, "All alliance members, report to my coordinates."

He then recieves Hell Beast's messege. "If you could come to my coordinates, 
it would be apreciated...." He replies, firing at Shocker.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathStorm falls forward into a boulder from Archangel's shots. He spins back 
around, firing a missile at Archangel.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike growls, firing at Tritan with his missile launcher and Shocker 
with his rifle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot and Reptilica emerge from the bushes, firing at Icedeamon and 
Shocker on Zardus' orders.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer opens his eyes, struggling to his feet when one of Icedeamon's 
shots nearly hits him in the head. He jumps up, firing at Icedeamon.
